content: परिधा {c3c} <ab>U.</ab> {@--1@} To put or wear (as a garment); त्वचं स मेध्यां परिधाय रौरवीं <ls>R. 3. 31.</ls> {@--2@} To surround, enclose. {@--3@} To direct towards. {@--4@} To put or place round. {@--5@} To cast round the eyes, turn the glance upon. {@--6@} To conclude, close (as the recitation of a hymn). {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} To cause to put on, clothe with.
